name: @tickethic/contracts
description: Generated contract addresses for Tickethic smart contracts. When you run `deploy:eventmanager` you can pass network name (i.e. localhost). Credits to : https://me.micahrl.com/blog/package-json-scripts-default-arguments/

scripts.deploy:dynamic: sh -c 'test $# -eq 0 && set -- localhost; cross-env HARDHAT_IGNITION_CONFIRM_DEPLOYMENT=true npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deploy.ts --network "$@" && npx hardhat run scripts/generate-contract-addresses.ts --network "$@"' _
scripts.deploy:amoy: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deploy.ts --network amoy
scripts.deploy:polygon: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deploy.ts --network polygon
